com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component

Interface InteractableComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, Interactable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractInteractableComponent, AbstractListBox, ActionListBox, Button, CheckBox, CheckBoxList, CommonCheckBox, EditArea, PasswordBox, RadioCheckBoxList, TextArea, TextBox

    public interface InteractableComponent
extends Interactable, Component
    This interface doesn't add anything, it's just for making a common interface for Interactables and Components.
    Author:
    Martin

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Interactable

        Interactable.FocusChangeDirection, Interactable.Result

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Component

        Component.Alignment

    • Method Summary
